Classes in kdl.prox.dbvis used by kdl.prox.dbvis
GraphEdit
          Records changes to a Graph, i.e., Vertex and Edge instances added or removed.
LayoutStateTransitionFunction
          Supports layout animation via the creation of intermediate VertexLocationFunction instances, given start and end states.
PolarCoordinate
          A simple rho theta pair.
ProxItemData
          Encapsulates Proximity data for all cases of vertex types - non-pseudo, pseudo-not-pager, and pseudo-and-pager.
ProxSparseVertex
          Represents a Proximity object.
RadiiInfo
          A means to communicate radii-drawing information to DBVisualizerJFrame.makeRadiiPaintable().
